text: The permissible height of buildings in any district shall not exceed the maximum height of buildings now authorized upon any street in any part of the District of Columbia by subchapter I of this chapter, regulating the height of buildings in the District of Columbia.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 5-418.

1973 Ed., § 5-418.

Effective Dates

Section 204 of Public Law 97-241 provided that the amendments made by title II shall take effect on October 1, 1982.

DC CODE § 6-641.06

Current through December 11, 2012

chapter.text: Zoning and Height of Buildings. (Refs & Annos)
